column4: I have a question, if i find an image I like on the internet, and i rght click and go save as wallpaper, and nothing changes, and even if i save it, and then go save to wallpaper again, and it will not change,  is there a way to refresh my desktop?
but if i right click again and go.. change desktop background, and nothing still does not change.
set as wallpaper OR save it to your /home/<user> and right-click on the desktop & select 'Change Desktop Background'
i have been getting irate at my computer slightly lately
sorry about that. i lost a few hairs over mine as well. :)

i just "set as wallpaper" and it worked.
